caption.p: Social distancing protocol to reduce transmission of COVID-19 (adapted from CDC, 2020).

tr.td: When feasible, limit all gatherings to under 10 people. If not possible, keep 6 feet distance from nearest person. Wear a homemade mask whenever outside.
Avoid dine-in areas when possible. If necessary, use take-out/delivery options. Always wear a homemade mask covering mouth and nose when out in public.
Convert all physical meetings to virtual through video chat applications.
Reduce exposure to confined areas such as elevators by using alternative measures such as stairways when possible.
Maintain 6-feet social distancing whenever encountering an individual that appears ill. Always wear a mask when taking care of sick persons.
Maintain proper hygiene by using disposable tissues or upper arm to cover sneeze or cough. Avoid touching unnecessary surfaces and use soap and water or hand sanitizer often.

fn.p: CDC, Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.
